name: drupal/dxpr_cms_starter
description: Sets up a DXPR CMS site with useful features and sample content.

suggest.drupal/dxpr_cms_accessibility_tools: Adds tools to improve website accessibility
suggest.drupal/dxpr_cms_ai: Adds AI-powered features to your website
suggest.drupal/dxpr_cms_blog: Sets up a basic blog, with tagging
suggest.drupal/dxpr_cms_case_study: Adds a case study content type that provides detailed information about a subject to the intended audience
suggest.drupal/dxpr_cms_events: A content type and view to help you manage events
suggest.drupal/dxpr_cms_news: Adds a news content type with an overview page and related news items
suggest.drupal/dxpr_cms_person: Adds a person profile content type that provides information about a person
suggest.drupal/dxpr_cms_project: Adds a project content type that provides information about an example of work to the intended audience
